message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $8,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. However, the product's value to me is considerably higher than your offer.  I could consider letting it go for $13,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my position. I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our respective values.
